comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: According to this article, John Hennessy was publisher of the New York Press, a newspaper of the time: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E03E3DE1438E633A... The NY Press may have been instrumental in changing the baseball's team from "Highlanders" to "Yankees": en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_York_Press_(historical)

comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC portrait of John A. Hennessy, who offered testimony in New York concerning alleged corruption in awarding contracts for construction of the New York State Barge Canal:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4408111461/in/photostream/]
